channel.title: I just can't decide
channel.description:
Should I make a 317 server with just kinda newbie shops (and for higher levels things like dragon shop), and like not a XP rate of 750, but like 100-200. Kinda a "Simple" server.
Or a 317 server with a XP rate of 800, home on a weird place, starter of 50 mill and 2 mill manta's with pk shops including godswords?

item.title: I just can't decide
item.dc:creator: @MajorPro MajorPro
item.description:
@MajorPro wrote:

Should be a regular server, where you skill and pk along with party hats and such given out on events. Exp rates shouldn’t be to high, maybe around 40-80 exp per 1 dmg (I’ve made a server before with 100 exp and people leveled way to fast).

Read full topic

item.title: I just can't decide
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

ok…well id say stick with something you think looks good and see if you can change stuff around like npcs/shops/items
id say try a 508 with better items (recommending hybrid pvp)

i agree with the guy below

Read full topic

item.title: I just can't decide
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:4, topic:391490”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=487500.msg3572307#msg3572307 date=1303148659]
How about it make neither and make a complete eco where there are no shops.
[/quote]

Then the economy would be shit because there are no ships. No place to buy/sell, except other players. So if you want something, you have to ask each player if they have it. If they don’t, you’re out of luck. And if the item you want doesn’t drop from anything, you can never get it.[/quote]unless you had an exchange system of sorts, and an active forums

Read full topic

item.title: I just can't decide
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Loveandpower:

How about it make neither and make a complete eco where there are no shops.

Then the economy would be shit because there are no ships. No place to buy/sell, except other players. So if you want something, you have to ask each player if they have it. If they don’t, you’re out of luck. And if the item you want doesn’t drop from anything, you can never get it.

Read full topic
